Welcome to GIMod's documentation!
=================================

Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`

* :ref:`search`


GIMod
========

GIMod will solve your problem of where to start with documentation,
by providing a basic explanation of how to do it easily.

Look how easy it is to use:

    import GIMod
    # Get your stuff done
    GIMod.do_stuff()

Features
--------

- Be awesome
- Make things faster

Installation
------------

Install GIMod by running:

    install GIMod

Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: github.com/GIMod/GIMod/issues
- Source Code: github.com/GIMod/GIMod

Support
-------

If you are having issues, please let us know.
We have a mailing list located at: GIMod@google-groups.com

License
-------

The GIMod is licensed under the BSD license.
